sys_script.name: checkUniqueCertificate

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_560219_se_cert_acquisition</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>checkUniqueCertificate</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var grCerAs = new GlideRecord('x_560219_se_cert_acquisition');
	grCerAs.addQuery('se_cert_acquisition_submission', current.se_cert_acquisition_submission);
	grCerAs.addQuery('se_cert_acquisition_certificate', current.se_cert_acquisition_certificate);
	grCerAs.query();
	if(grCerAs.getRowCount() > 0){
		current.setAbortAction(true);//deny insert
		gs.addErrorMessage("Your inserted certificate is duplicate, please choose another one!");
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-21 08:29:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0d71e110db156c101738656b4b9619ae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>checkUniqueCertificate</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Skill Evaluation" source="x_560219_se">efb54d9bdb85a8101738656b4b9619c5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Skill Evaluation">efb54d9bdb85a8101738656b4b9619c5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_0d71e110db156c101738656b4b9619ae</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-21 12:20:15</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0d71e110db156c101738656b4b9619ae"/></record_update>
